title: Galvanic Skin Response

skincon.description: ReadOnly, the value of skin conductance. unit is uS (micro siemens)

skinres.description: ReadOnly, the value of skin resistance. unit is Ohm

skincv.description: ReadOnly, the value of skin conductance in voltage. unit is volt

observedtime.description: ReadOnly, An ISO8601 format time indicating when the data is observed (ex: 2016-02-15T09:19Z)
